channel.title: Science Friday Audio Podcast
channel.description: Science Friday, as heard on NPR, is a weekly discussion of the latest news in science, technology, health, and the environment hosted by Ira Flatow. Ira interviews scientists, authors, and policymakers, and listeners can call in and ask questions as well. Hear it each week on NPR stations nationwide -- or online!
channel.itunes:author: Science Friday
channel.itunes:subtitle: Science Friday is a discussion of the latest news in science, tech, health, and the environment hosted by Ira Flatow. We interview scientists, authors, and policymakers, and take your questions. Hear it weekly on NPR stations nationwide, or online here!
channel.itunes:summary: Science Friday, as heard on NPR, is a weekly discussion of the latest news in science, technology, health, and the environment hosted by Ira Flatow. Ira interviews scientists, authors, and policymakers, and listeners can call in and ask questions as well. Watch the latest science videos from the Science Friday website.
channel.itunes:keywords: Science Friday, scifri, science technology environment health medicine scientist NPR News public radio ira flatow ira plato faltow
